channel.title: Comments on: Get ready for application season!

item.title: By: Sam Pierce
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/get-ready-for-application-season/#comment-1368">Lori Randolph</a>.
Hi Lori! We always aim to have it up and running no later than January 1. Often it'll go live a few weeks earlier. You can join our community newsletter (/news/) if you haven't already, and you can also follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/ucb.atdp). Either will alert you as soon as the process is officially open!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lori Randolph.

Hi Lori! We always aim to have it up and running no later than January 1. Often it’ll go live a few weeks earlier. You can join our community newsletter (/news/) if you haven’t already, and you can also follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/ucb.atdp). Either will alert you as soon as the process is officially open!

item.title: By: Lori Randolph
item.dc:creator: Lori Randolph
item.description: Good morning! When will the online application process be available to complete for 2018 session. Tried to complete today and it is "closed." Thank you
item.content:encoded: Good morning! When will the online application process be available to complete for 2018 session. Tried to complete today and it is “closed.” Thank you
